眩.definition: (literary) dizzy; (literary) dazzled; bewildered; to dazzle (variant of 炫[xuan4])

眩惑.definition: confusion; unable to escape from infatuation or addiction

眩暈.definition: vertigo; dizziness; fainting; feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke); Taiwan pr. [xuan4 yun1]

眩耀.definition: giddy; confused; variant of 炫耀[xuan4yao4]
